Name: Vagrant Knight
About the game: Vagrant Knight is a top-down challenging action roguelike with fast paced hack-n-slash combat mechanics with spell casting. Clear each room of never-ending horde of monster. At end of each level, upgrade your character with new special attack and equip yourself with new spell. Each special attack or spell is unique. Discover how each combination of these sword swinging and spell slinging take our enemies. Each level ends with upgrade cards for your character stats, new melee attacks and new spells. Have fun discovering new spells and special attacks and use them to slay countless monster spawn in the next level. Key Features Hack and slash your way against room filled with waves an waves of enemies. Use newly acquired spells and special attacks to repel wave of incoming enemies. Many upgradable stats to build up your character. Many unique enemy types, more are coming soon.
